titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: This is William's birthday. He has now completed 24 years. I miss him more as time passes: but, of course, he is too young to tie his fortunes to mine, &, if he "makes good" in S. Africa I am content.
